events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's refund request.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I will assist you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
Please share your order number so I can locate your purchase and start the refund process.
Sure, my order number is 78912345. The item I received is not what I ordered, and I want my money back.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process, and you will receive the amount within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate your support in resolving this matter promptly.
The refund request has been successfully processed, and the case is marked as resolved.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund and to ask if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was successful and there were no further issues, the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a survey to gather feedback on your experience with our refund process. We appreciate your input.
